parodyLrcLines.text: (Foodie kid)
Yum!
(My tummy is hungry!)
I want fries
Callin', my hungry stomach moans (ring, ring)
Where's mommy with the super yummy food? (yum, yum)
I eat pizza like a super munchin' pro (Like a, yum, like a, yum)
I eat pizza like my buddy Joe (Yummy, yum!)
Kid Chef, my hunger is not a silly joke (haha, hahahahaha)
My best friend stays with the crispy fries (yum, yum, yum-yum)
You mess around and get hungry (you get hungry, yum!)
'Cause I want treats (Too many yummy treats!)
Callin' my hungry tummy loud (Ring-ring, ring, ring-ring, ring, ring-ring)
Where's mommy with the (chef with the) yummy, yummy snack? (yum)
I eat pizza like a super munchin' pro (like a munchin' pro)
I eat pizza like my buddy Joe (Yummy, Yummy)
Kid Chef got so many foods (I eat it all!)
Call me hungry, I just can't controlâ€”
Oh! Yum! Gosh! Yay!
Young Kid Chef and I'm getting really full (munch-munch)
See how I chewed it 'cause I'm really with the eats (yum-yum)
See me in the kitchen and I be really with a (plate, plate), with a
Big feast (feast), friends are straight munching (munch)
Friends straight see me, when they see me, they want snacks (what?)
I'm the best food eater, friend, come and grab it (got it)
Young Kid Chef, I'm like the hungry Food Goblin (Hahaha)
I got snacks (Snacks!)
Callin', my hungry tummy, rum-ble (rumble!)
Where's mommy with the super yummy food?
(With the super yummy food!)
Food (with the super yummy food!)
Super yummy food (yum!)
With the food (getting full), with my friends (yum, yay!)
I ate your snack (yum!)
And they didn't even tell a soul (they ate it all!)
Wow, these fries are nice, what are you talking about?
('Cause I got) food (snacks!)
And my friend John-Two, my friend
Mommy, the yummy chef friend, what are they all talking about?
I got snacks, yum!
Young Kid Chef, I eat it on the go

summaryNarration: This parody transforms the original song's intense themes into a lighthearted and dramatic ode to pizza and fast food. With every line carefully rewritten to maintain syllable count, the lyrics now express a child's passionate craving for yummy treats, from fries to pizza, all in a wholesome and energetic tone suitable for kids.

highlights: Strict adherence to syllable count for vocal sync
Complete removal of profanity and adult themes
Consistent kid-friendly fast food obsession theme
Dramatic and expressive language for a child's hunger
